core_principles: Fusion: Wellness aesthetics x Technical Utility
Texture: Paper grain, organic shapes, no sterile flats
Negative Space: Generous breathing room (2x standard)

usage.primary: Main actions, active states, progress bars
usage.accent: Recording state (THE RED DOT), critical alerts, 'hot' interactions
usage.background: Global page background - meant to look like high-quality paper

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on the background to simulate paper.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full hover:bg-primary/90 px-8 py-6 text-lg transition-transform hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground rounded-full hover:bg-secondary/80 px-6 py-4

cards.style: bg-card border-none shadow-soft rounded-3xl p-8 transition-all hover:shadow-float
cards.dashboard_widget: bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/20 shadow-sm rounded-2xl p-6

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-primary px-0 py-2 rounded-none focus:ring-0 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 font-serif text-xl

navigation.style: floating dock or simple top-right cluster. No heavy sidebars.

layout_strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode A) - Asymmetric. Hero stat block (streak) takes prominence. Quick start is a large, inviting 'Call to Adventure'.
layout_strategies.practice_session: Zen Mode. Center the visualization. Fade out all non-essential UI. Use 'The Tracing Beam' effect around the active recording area.
layout_strategies.marketing_landing: Scroll-telling. Large serif typography. Parallax images of calm environments.

motion.guidelines: Slow, fluid, organic. No snap animations.
motion.micro_interactions: Buttons swell gently on hover. Cards lift slightly.

accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect system settings. Disable waveform animations if requested.
accessibility.screen_readers: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label. Charts must have table fallbacks.

hero_background.usage: Landing page hero background with overlay

technical_implementation.audio_visualization: Use Web Audio API AnalyserNode. Visualize as 'Soft Bars' (rounded caps, varied opacity) or 'Organic Blob' (using simplex noise). Avoid jagged lines.
technical_implementation.charts: Recharts (via Shadcn). Customize colors to match palette (Sage, Terracotta, Sand). Remove grid lines. Use minimalist tooltips.
technical_implementation.storage: IndexedDB (via Dexie.js) for recording metadata and hesitation scores. LocalStorage for preferences.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom color palette and border radius.
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn, override the default 'slate' feel. Force 'rounded-2xl' and 'bg-white' with 'shadow-soft'.
4. NO DEFAULT SCROLLBARS: Hide scrollbars or style them thin and muted.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards).
6. OFFLINE FIRST: Ensure all assets are cached or lightweight. Use CSS gradients over heavy images where possible.
7. PRIVACY UI: Add a visible 'Offline & Private' badge in the header to reassure users.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
